summary: Adds a new Island worldspace with new enemies once defeated you can live in their hideout. Its a new Thief based Cave home,but works well for any player type really. It is a large cave, and there are 3 teleportation spells leading to the cave, the island and then back to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Pictures Speak Louder than words so go and look at those as well please. Entrance near Solitude Lighthouse.
I\'ve no clue if this is follower friendly, there is a navmesh but I don\'t use followers. So let me know.

Adds a new Island worldspace with new enemies once defeated you can live in their hideout. Its a new Thief based Cave home,but works well for any player type really. It is a large cave, and there are 3 teleportation spells leading to the cave, the island and then back to Skyrim. All of the containers should be safe for storage aside from the Enchanted Strongbox.
author: Watcherzero
